Reviews.Title: I too would give this no stars if that were possible!
Reviews.Author: Laura Piacenti "laurapia"
Reviews.Content: I have this piece of crap camera which I bought from Best Buy for the purposes of snorkling on a cruise. It lasted the first day and as another claimant said I also never took it below the water deeper than 2-3 feet, definitely NOT the 16 feet Fuji CLAIMS it can do, and my battery case was NOT open or unlocked since I made VERY sure of that before using it in the water and the next day it had condensation underneath the lens and would not take any more pictures. UNFORTUNATELY some how I lost my receipt and so I'm left with a 200 plus dollar paper weight now! Save your money and go to a dive supply website and get a real waterproof camera for just a bit more money. That's what I'm going to do.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE
Reviews.Author: kgriffin11
Reviews.Content: If i could rate this no stars i would! The quiality of the pictures are horrible! Dont plan on having your picture turn out unless you have the absolute PERFECT lighting. This camera is the worst camera i have ever used! The picture color is always off or the picture is blury. The only good thing is that it is water proof.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera - Consider it Water Resistant
Reviews.Author: S. Duchan
Reviews.Content: Ok this camera takes very good pictures for the low price. I would consider it more weather resistant than weather proof. However, it is still a great value for the price it is selling at and takes excellent pictures.

Reviews.Title: not waterproof!
Reviews.Author: Brittany
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera at Target a few years ago and it always worked fine until I used it underwater for the first time a couple months ago. It wouldn't take pictures anymore. I called FujiFilm to see if it could be fixed, and they wanted to charge me $115. Waste of money!!!!

Reviews.Title: NOT waterproof
Reviews.Author: g2
Reviews.Content: NOT waterproof.... This camera died in the swimming pool - standing in the shallow end. Battery door came open. This camera failed to operate as promised. Fuji customer support is not much better. Gave me a repair estimate higher than the price I paid for the camera. Don't buy this camera, you will be sorry like myself and many others.

Reviews.Title: Excellent article.
Reviews.Author: Juan Quintana
Reviews.Content: Excellent article. The purchase was all right, and I'm happy with my new camera. Everithing was in order. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: I read a few that give 3 o less. I disagree.
Reviews.Author: Adol_Emmons
Reviews.Content: It is a cheap camera? (by the price, yes, it is!), but the quality is great, A known brand, 14 mpx, Waterproof, (desides dust/frezze/shok proof). by less 100 bucks! come on! it is a great deal!I try it underwater (on a bath tub), just for fun, I took pretty well photos!... after that the cam was leaking water from the joint lines, a few drops... (The water never gone into the internal parts).I pretend to take it to the beach and try it under field conditions !!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: deidre portzen
Reviews.Content: I had this camera before and had to purchase it again.it is a little slow taking pics and the perfect pic is what you wont get but you are not paying top dollar. LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: M4rkuz "Marcus Sánchez"
Reviews.Content: Great over all, in discount price at least, I wouldn't buy that over 90 dollars, so keep looking the bargains

Reviews.Title: Definitely, unquestionably waterproof
Reviews.Author: ellkay
Reviews.Content: I like this camera. It's not the best quality, but it really is waterproof! I actually found this camera while kayaking. It was underwater for who knows how long and still worked when I retrieved it from the sand. The pictures are kind of blurry and low quality if you're not outside, but if you're looking for a good outside camera, this is it.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Jera Meighen
Reviews.Content: We had fun in Mexico with camera. It met our expectations. Disappointed in recommended compatible devices, part of which came with camera and others that were not needess

Reviews.Title: Waterproof? Yeah right!
Reviews.Author: wbc1234
Reviews.Content: We bought this for a cruise with the intention of using it in ports. After the first snorkeling experience it started having problems with the zoom. Then the screen started messing up from condensation. Now that we're home it has dried out and is working, but we couldn't use it for our other port days. I wouldn't buy it again.

Reviews.Title: I WISH I HAD READ THE REVIEWS.
Reviews.Author: A_wesome
Reviews.Content: My camera did really well for the first 3 months I had it, since I got it for Christmas. But, once it started getting warm enough to go swimming, and I started taking it in the water, it started to not have as great quality of pictures. Then, out of the blue, at summer camp, water got into the battery compartment. THE BATTERY DOOR WAS CLOSED AND LOCKED. I made absolute certain of that before I went into the water. After that, it was never really water proof. I could bring it in for a little while and it would work, but if I submerged it about a foot under, there would be condensation on the inside and  I would have to dry it out. It had been working better, so I took it snorkeling and now it's completely dead.My mom bought the same camera, never brought it underwater, and it takes terrible pictures just generally.Crappy camera out of water, and doesn't really hold up to the "waterproof" standards.Save your money for a little while longer, and get a kodak or canon. Fujifilm not only doesn't have great products, but they don't want to give you any money back, even with a warranty.Now, I'm saving for this camera:[...]My mom now has it, it's cheap, but works super great. User friendly and takes great pictures no matter the lighting. I reccomend this, or really any other camera than the fujifilm.I just wish I had read the reviews before asking for it.

Reviews.Title: Did not work when i got it
Reviews.Author: GABRIEL HERRERA MACIAS
Reviews.Content: Hello i bought this camera but didnt used until i had my vacation (1 month after i got it) and whuen i turn it on in the screen was a message (zoom error) and just didnt work... Now the im tryn to return the camera i cant.... The camera was never even opened or smash o hit by anything. It came broken and now im stuck with a camera the dosent work and i cant get my money back or a new camera... Its the first time this happen to me i really hope this can help so you guys just get me another camera....

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: jaime enchautegui
Reviews.Content: going on vacation soon had other fujifilm  left it to my GF she taking great pic above and underwater let see what this one can do

ProductInfo.Features:
Sealed with powerful waterproof of up to 5m (16.4ft.) depth, get close, capture the excitement and dynamic scenes of the water world.
Perfect for sports activities! The FinePix XP20 can survive a 1.5m (4.9ft.) fall.
The FinePix XP20 will suit perfectly for any winter activities proving its durability for max. -10°C (14°F).
Great for locations such as sandy beaches and outdoor wilderness.
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix XP20 Silver 14 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD
